alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 6:29AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG PORTION OF A LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS MOVING ACROSS SOUTHERN PORTION OF HOUSTON METRO CAPABLE OF PRODUCING GUSTY WINDS... At 628 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Magnolia Park to Greater Hobby Area to Pearland to near Alvin. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, northwestern League City, Baytown, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Alvin, South Houston, Seabrook, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Webster, eastern Manvel, Cloverleaf, Second Ward, South Belt / Ellington, Highlands, Barrett, and Greater Eastwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
